attestation_standard: SICA Constitution §3.1 Tier 3 — Three-Chain Blockchain Registry

bitcoin.notes: Verify with ots-cli: ots verify master-index.json.ots

ethereum.notes: Transaction data field will contain the SHA3-512 hash above.

arweave.notes: Full master-index.json stored permanently on Arweave.

verification_instructions.bitcoin: Download master-index.json.ots. Install ots-cli (pip install opentimestamps-client). Run: ots verify master-index.json.ots
verification_instructions.ethereum: Visit etherscan.io/tx/[hash]. Verify data field matches attested_hash.
verification_instructions.arweave: Fetch from gateway URL. Compute SHA3-512. Compare against attested_hash.

quorum_rule: 2 of 3 chains must confirm for attestation to be valid per SICA §3.1.
